idea:
Original Concept

"Chav Maharashtrachi" is an Extensive and Widespread Concept. The main motive of this concept will give the audience a great experience about Maharashtrian Authentic Food, Art, Culture, and Tradition.


In detail - Prastavna 

The word "Marathamola" reminds us of various art forms like Povada, Lavani, Nath (Maharashtrian Jewellery), Mirchicha Kharda (Spicy Chilly chatni), Paithani, Kolhapuri Chappal, and the last but not the least Kokanimeva. Maharashtra itself means a celebration of culture, tradition, and authentic food. each Region in Maharashtra has its own different specialty. 

The word "Chav" means taste and Chav Maharashtrachi reminds us of Maharashtrian food like Puranpoli, Kothimbirvadi, Sabudana Vada, Aluvadi, and many more.

But does taste matters only in food?

In today's world, we are losing out on Maharashtrian Culture and authentic food recipes which our mother and grandmother use to make when we were kids. Maharashtra has many such authentic food recipes and cultures that need to be preserved for our next generations. 

Looking at the importance of this subject, we are going to start a Food Travel Show. The main aim of this travel show is to showcase five main regions of Maharashtra Kokan, Paschim Maharashtra, Khandesh, Marathawada, Vidarbha.

Chav Maharashtrachi is a e-commerce platform for small-medium businesses, Bachat Gat, Self Help Group, Home Makers interior parts of Maharashtra and to showcase and sell their products and services.
name: Chav Maharashtrachi

idea: At SourceGoodFood we aim to usher in a better food system from farm to fork. As a marketplace for everything related to food, we are bringing together the best in class raw materials, expert knowledge and access to new markets all under one roof. From Direct from farm to direct to retail we are enabling food processors and manufactures to focus on what matters most - innovation, which will give consumers more choices. Enabled by technology, we aim to make this marketplace frictionless. To know more about our journey and partner with us, please contact customer.support@sourcegoodfood.com
name: SOURCE GOOD FOOD TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
I aim to build the elder and palliative care center for elders which will not be just a caregiving facility for them, but it will be their home, and their community.


Vision

I believe in a society where elders are healthy, happy, empowered and socially integrated; where elders are encouraged and enabled to age with respect and dignity. 


Mission

My mission is to work towards developing and implementing services that enable senior citizen to remain healthy, active, empowered, enhanced with the quality of life through innovative and comprehensive care with love and affection.



Executive Summary


We aim to be that home accommodating 15 -20 full-time assisted living residents, offering care in a respectful, self-sustaining community with skilled nursing care for 60+ age group residents. We assure that the residents will get the "Feel of their own home". We'll give them feel like home, love, care, belongingness, sense of ownership, sense of security and space where they can make friends, they can share and interact with each other, also they can learn or teach and participate in various recreational

activities.


The home will be a cluster of fully furnished with separate departments, determined on the basis of senior citizens who is suffering from different types of illnesses. We will majorly focus on Alzheimer and Dementia. It will be more like a retirement friendly living facility.
name: ELDER AND PALLIATIVE CARE CENTER
